ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learnt a lot about academic essay writing and I can certainly say that the quality of my writing has improved immensely after taking this class.
I learned various techniques on how to structure my essays. As well as, insights into the tourist industry and how it fabricates the authenticity of many destinations.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Of course, the course has a lot of work to do in a single month so I understand that the schedule was full and a tad bit chaotic out of necessity. That being said, I do believe making the writing tutors available on more than 2 days during the summer would be highly beneficial since more often than not, I wouldn't be able to meet with a writing tutor before the submission of my essay due to very few timeslots available. The course included a lot of different pieces of writing to reference and learn about and they spanned a multitude of subject areas. However, I do wish we had the chance to watch the movies/clips we were assigned since sometimes they were unavailable or we had to pay for them.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: All in all, yes! The course is a LOT of work during the summer but it is a great way to learn more about and gain familiarity with academic writing.

narratives.question_text: The Canvas course site allowed me to identify and access required course materials easily.
How will you use the knowledge and skills you learned in this course in your future endeavors?
comments: I will definitely use a lot of the writing techniques we learnt in class in my future writing endeavors here at Yale!
I'll take the knowledge that I've gained through this class on writing essays and apply it in my future writing courses.
